Last observation values for a station

Source: R/aemet_last_obs.R
aemet_last_obs.Rd

Get last observation values for a station.

Usage,
aemet_last_obs(station = "all", verbose = FALSE, return_sf = FALSE)

Arguments

station

Character string with station identifier code(s) (see aemet_stations()) or "all" for all the stations.

verbose

Logical TRUE/FALSE. Provides information about the flow of information between the client and server.

return_sf

Logical TRUE or FALSE. Should the function return an sf spatial object? If FALSE (the default value) it returns a tibble. Note that you need to have the sf package installed.

Value

A tibble or a sf object.

API Key

You need to set your API Key globally using aemet_api_key().

See also

Other aemet_api_data: aemet_daily_clim(), aemet_extremes_clim(), aemet_monthly, aemet_normal, aemet_stations()

Examples


library(tibble)
obs <- aemet_last_obs(c("9434", "3195"))
glimpse(obs)
#> Rows: 48

Contents

About climaemet

Developed by Manuel Pizarro, Diego Hernangómez, Gema Fernández-Avilés.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.0.

Template by Bootstrapious . Ported to pkgdown by dieghernan.
